languages.text: "Кому-то придется умереть, чтобы отвести беду от товарищей. Увы, такова жизнь".
"Someone must die to shield their comrades from further tragedy. Alas, such is life."
languages.original_text: "Кому-то придется умереть, чтобы отвести беду от товарищей. Увы, такова жизнь".

traits.locale_text: "Someone will have to die to ward the trouble away from their comrades. Alas, such is life."
"Someone will have to die to ward the trouble away from their comrades. Alas, such is life."
"Someone must die to shield their comrades from further tragedy. Alas, such is life."
"Someone must die to shield their comrades from further tragedy. Alas, such is life."
"Someone must die to shield their comrades from further tragedy. Alas, such is life."
"Someone must die to shield their comrades from further tragedy. Alas, such is life."

languages.text: “必须得有人做出牺牲，才能把麻烦从同胞那里引开。这很遗憾，但生活就是如此。”
languages.original_text: "Someone must die to shield their comrades from further tragedy. Alas, such is life."

traits.locale_text: “必须得有人做出牺牲，才能把麻烦从同胞那里引开。这很遗憾，但生活就是如此。”

languages.text: «Alguien debe morir para proteger a sus camaradas de más desgracias. Así es la vida».
languages.original_text: "Someone must die to shield their comrades from further tragedy. Alas, such is life."

traits.locale_text: «Alguien debe morir para proteger a sus camaradas de más desgracias. Así es la vida».

languages.text: 「さらなる悲劇から仲間を守るためには、誰かが命を投げ出す必要があります。残念ですが、人生とはそういうものです」
languages.original_text: "Someone must die to shield their comrades from further tragedy. Alas, such is life."

traits.locale_text: 「さらなる悲劇から仲間を守るためには、誰かが命を投げ出す必要があります。残念ですが、人生とはそういうものです」

languages.text: « Quelqu'un doit mourir pour protéger le plus grand nombre d'une tragédie plus grande encore. C'est regrettable, mais ainsi va la vie. »
languages.original_text: "Someone must die to shield their comrades from further tragedy. Alas, such is life."

traits.locale_text: « Quelqu'un doit mourir pour protéger le plus grand nombre d'une tragédie plus grande encore. C'est regrettable, mais ainsi va la vie. »

languages.text: "Jemand muss sterben, um seine Kameraden vor weiteren Tragödien zu bewahren. So ist das Leben leider."
languages.original_text: "Someone must die to shield their comrades from further tragedy. Alas, such is life."

traits.locale_text: "Jemand muss sterben, um seine Kameraden vor weiteren Tragödien zu bewahren. So ist das Leben leider."

languages.text: "Yoldaşlarını daha fazla trajediden korumak için birisinin ölmesi gerek. Ne yazık ki hayat böyle bir şey."
languages.original_text: "Someone must die to shield their comrades from further tragedy. Alas, such is life."
